name: Entangled (itch) (UnbanBraids)
description:
Created for the GMTK game jam 2021.

A rope swing platformer following two friends on their mountaineering holiday.

Hope you can get them to the end!

Use WASD to move, left MB to shoot a rope at your companion and swing about to clear the levels. Use right MB to switch between players and freeze the inactive player in place so you can use him as a handy hook point. Jump about and release the rope with SPACE.

Made in about 12 hours that I was able to find over the course of the weekend. First jam, first 'finished' and published game. I'm just here for the inspiration and the push to get something done. Coming back to this one though, I think there might be something here.
